cards.name: Ardy's Study
cards.originalText:

You may play the top card of the archived library if it's a permanent card.

cards.name: Cranial Violation
cards.originalText:
Each player reveals their hand. Choose a creature card revealed this way. Its owner discards it.

cards.name: Flesh to Rot
cards.originalText:

All creatures get -1/-1 for each time counter on Flesh to Rot.

cards.name: Infuse the Apparatus
cards.originalText:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
Exile all cards from your graveyard. You may search your library for any number of instant and/or sorcery cards with different names that share a name with one or more cards exiled this way and cast them without paying their mana costs, then shuffle your library. Exile Infuse the Apparatus.

cards.name: Mystic Meddling
cards.originalText: Exile target spell. Then that spell's controller may cast a spell they own from outside the game that shares a type with the exiled card without paying its mana cost if able.

rulings.text: In a Constructed tournament, "outside the game" refers to that player's sideboard. In a Limited game, "outside the game" refers to all cards that player drafted that aren't in that player's deck or removed from that player's card pool. Otherwise, it refers to any card in MSEM.

cards.text: Exile target spell. Then that spell's controller may cast a spell they own from outside the game that shares a type with the exiled card without paying its mana cost if able.

cards.name: Saigura Tam

cards.name: Savage Congregation
cards.originalText:
Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with total converted mana cost 4 or less from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

cards.name: Vidal, Rune Thief
cards.originalText:
Haste
When Vidal enters the battlefield, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an enchantment card with converted mana cost 3 or less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Sacrifice that enchantment at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: The moral of the Tale of the Urchin King: heroes get remembered, but villains never die.
